signature: List<E> union(List<? extends E>, List<? extends E>)

enhanced_by.reason: Ensures that null lists are handled gracefully before performing union operation.
Prevents modification of the input lists during the union operation.

enhanced_by.method_name: intersection(List<? extends E>, List<? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: The intersection method can be used to verify that the union operation does not include duplicates.
The subtract method can be used to verify the correctness of the union operation by checking the remaining elements after subtraction.
